scripts.do-b-run: yarn --cwd ./front build && NODE_ENV=production node -r dotenv/config server.js
scripts.do-pull-run-v2: git pull && git checkout v2 && yarn --cwd ./front build && NODE_ENV=production node -r dotenv/config server.js
scripts.heroku-prebuild: echo This runs before Heroku installs your dependencies.
scripts.heroku-postbuild: YARN_PRODUCTION=false yarn --cwd ./front install && yarn --cwd ./back install && yarn build
scripts.heroku-postbuild-npm: NPM_CONFIG_PRODUCTION=false npm --prefix front install && npm --prefix back install && npm --prefix front build
